title: A Thousand Lies and a Hundred Plans
overview: At the wedding ceremony of Li Youyou, the daughter of the Chairman of Li's Group, and her love Ning Yang, the secretary Xin Ran was harassed. The groom Ning Yang showed up and saved her, and they then spent a night together. At the same time, a car accident suddenly struck Chairman Li. Therefore, Ning Yang became the descendent of his place. Yet Xin Ran noticed that all the women around Ning Yang, including Li Youyou, started to disappear. The cover of Ning Yang was slowly revealed.
